fields.name: Tadasana
fields.description: Mountain Pose promotes balance and alignment.
fields.benefits: Improves posture, strengthens thighs and core.

fields.name: Bhujangasana
fields.description: Cobra Pose stretches chest and spine.
fields.benefits: Strengthens spine, opens lungs, relieves stress.

fields.name: Vrikshasana
fields.description: Tree Pose encourages stability and focus.
fields.benefits: Enhances concentration, strengthens legs and core.
